data.name: Sample - HarfangLab EDR - 1.0.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "HarfangLab EDR" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Fetch Security events
workflows.description: Fetches events based on input filters

workflows.name: Search Multiple IoCs
workflows.description: Search for multiple IoCs within HarfangLab telemetry

workflows.name: > HarfangLabEDR > Fetch
workflows.description: This playbook fetch the open incidents.

arguments.fetch_mode: By Updates In Last X Minutes

conditions.condition: {{ vars.records_count is not none and vars.records_count > 0 }}

arguments.last_pull_time: {% if vars.steps.Get_Macro_Value.data['hydra:member'] | length > 0 %}    {% if vars.request.env_setup %}        {% if not vars.minutes or vars.minutes == '' %}            0        {% else %}            {{vars.minutes}}         {% endif %}    {% else %}        {{ ((arrow.now() - arrow.get(vars.steps.Get_Macro_Value.data['hydra:member'][0]['value'])).seconds / 60) | int }}    {% endif %}{% else %}    {% if not vars.minutes or vars.minutes == '' %}        0    {% else %}        {{vars.minutes}}    {% endif %}{% endif %}

step_variables._configuration_schema:
[
  {
    "title": "Pull Alerts Created In Last X Minutes",
    "required": true,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "type": "text",
    "name": "minutes",
    "tooltip": "Fetch Alerts from last X minutes. e.g 5",
    "value": 30
  },
  {
    "title": "Maximum Alerts To Pull",
    "name": "alert_count",
    "type": "integer",
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "value": 1000,
    "tooltip": "The Maximum number of Alerts to be fetched from HarfanglabEDR"
  },
  {
    "title": "Alert Status Name",
    "type": "multiselect",
    "name": "alert_status_name",
    "options": [
      "Ongoing",
      "Rejected",
      "Pending"
    ],
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "value": [
      "Ongoing"
    ]
  }
]

routes.name: Get Macro Value -> Set Time Configuration

workflows.name: HarfangLabEDR> Ingest
workflows.description: This playbook demonstrate the list incident operation.

resource.name: {{vars.item.name}}
resource.severity: {% if vars.item.severity == 1 %}{{"Severity" | picklist("Minimal", "@id")}}{%elif vars.item.severity == 2 %}{{"Severity" | picklist("Low", "@id")}}{%elif vars.item.severity == 3 %}{{"Severity" | picklist("Medium", "@id")}}{%elif vars.item.severity == 4 %}{{"Severity" | picklist("High", "@id")}}{%elif vars.item.severity == 5 %}{{"Severity" | picklist("Critical", "@id")}}{%endif%}

routes.name: Create Record -> Update Last Alert Pull Time
